articles.title: Former Ravens DC blasts Baltimore defense following Week 2 collapse vs. Dolphins - Ravens Wire
articles.description: A former Ravens defensive coordinator blasted the team’s defense after their collapse against the Dolphins in Week 2
articles.content: The Baltimore Ravens saw their defense collapse in front of their eyes during Week 2 of the 2022 season, blowing a 21-point lead in the fourth quarter en-route to a 42-38 loss to the Miami Dolphins. … [+1005 chars]
